title: Germany Modern Alpine Escape near Austrian Border with Onsite Dining & Wellness Spa
description:
Experience modern comfort in the heart of Bavaria's Alpine region at ibis Styles Bad Reichenhall. This contemporary hotel features bright, modern decor throughout and stylish rooms. Start your day with a signature breakfast in the restaurant before unwinding in the onsite spa, complete with a sauna and ice fountain.

Positioned for relaxation and adventure, this hotel sits just minutes from Bad Reichenhall's centre and thermal baths. Berchtesgaden National Park and Salzburg's cultural attractions are also within easy reach. After exploring the surrounding Alps or local wellness facilities, return to the hotel for a restful night's sleep.
